Package com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search

Class FormCollector

java.lang.Object
com.github.oeuvres.alix.lucene.search.FormCollector
All Implemented Interfaces:
FormIterator
public class FormCollector extends Object implements FormIterator
This implementation of the FormIterator contract allow to build custom lists of forms with freq (occurrences count) and score (a double) calculated else where. For example, merge stats about coocs around different pivot words.
